import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Popover, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { MenuIcon, XIcon } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; import Loader from "./Loader"; const navigation = [ { name: "Product", href: "#" }, { name: "Features", href: "#" }, { name: "Marketplace", href: "#" }, { name: "Company", href: "#" }, ]; export default function Header() { const [productDescription, setProductDescription] = useState(""); const [showLoader, setShowLoader] = useState(false); const [ads, setAds] = useState(""); const handleChange = (event) => { setProductDescription(event.target.value); }; const copyToClipboard = (text) => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); toast.success("Successfully Copied!"); }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setShowLoader(true); const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/generate-ad`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ productDescription }), }); const data = await response.json(); setAds(data.ad); }; const splitSentence = () => { const sentences = ads.split('. "'); console.log("here is the splitted one"+ sentences); } return (
